questions.label: Q. 10  A data analytics firm that operates its IT infrastructure on the AWS Cloud aims to swiftly build and deploy its flagship application in response to any modifications in the source code. In your capacity as a Developer Associate, which recommendations would you propose to initiate deployment? (Choose two)

choices.label: Keep the source code in an Amazon S3 bucket and start AWS CodePipeline whenever a file in the S3 bucket is updated
Keep the source code in Amazon EFS and start AWS CodePipeline whenever a file is updated
Keep the source code in an Amazon S3 bucket and set up AWS CodePipeline to recur at an interval of every 15 minutes
Keep the source code in an Amazon EBS volume and start AWS CodePipeline whenever there are updates to the source code
Keep the source code in an AWS CodeCommit repository and start AWS CodePipeline whenever a change is pushed to the CodeCommit repository

Q. 26  In the context of a company utilizing AWS Lambda functions triggered by various AWS services like Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose, Amazon API Gateway, Amazon Simple Storage Service, and Amazon CloudWatch Events, these Lambda functions share a common trait: handling substantial workloads encompassing tasks such as extensive data analysis, processing large files, and intricate statistical computations.
How can you enhance the performance of your AWS Lambda functions while keeping your code intact?

choices.label: Change the instance type for your Lambda function
Change your Lambda function runtime to use Golang
Increase the RAM assigned to your Lambda function
